roleset.name: performing, undergoing a surgical procedure

example.name: surgery-n:
example.text: After his gallbladder surgery he got bills for around $50,000.

example.name: surgical-j:
example.text: The evaluation and image-guided surgical treatment of the patient with a medically intractable seizure disorder.

example.name: surgical-j:
example.text: Kai never doubted his surgical skills

roleset.note:
SURGERY-N NOTES: (from surgery.01-n)
SURGICAL-J NOTES: (from surgical.01-j)

roleset.name: precise, like surgery

example.name: surgical-j:
example.text: He was surgical in breaking down the Dolphins on Sunday.
example.arg: in breaking down the Dolphins on Sunday.

example.name: surgical-jarg1
example.text: The severance between us was surgical, and there was no anaesthetic.

roleset.note: SURGICAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP. (from surgical.01-j)
